member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.Multimedia.MsError.ThrowExceptionForHR(System.Int32)
member.summary: If hr has a "failed" status code (E_*), throw an exception. Note that status messages (S_*) are not considered failure codes. If DES or DShow error text is available, it is used to build the exception, otherwise a generic com error is thrown.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.UI.Multimedia.DESError.ThrowExceptionForHR(System.Int32)
member.summary: If hr has a "failed" status code (E_*), throw an exception. Note that status messages (S_*) are not considered failure codes. If DES or DShow error text is available, it is used to build the exception, otherwise a generic com error is thrown.

member.name: T:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType
member.summary: You can use hook types to monitor and change window messages.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_JOURNALRECORD
member.summary: Use this hook type to control and record input events.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_JOURNALPLAYBACK
member.summary: Use this hook type to insert messages in the windows system queue. For example, you can play recorded mouse events.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_KEYBOARD
member.summary: Use this hook type to monitor the keyboard events.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_GETMESSAGE
member.summary: Use this hook type to get messages returned by the GetMessage and PeekMessage functions.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_CALLWNDPROC
member.summary: Use this hook type to get the message passed to some of the windows procedures before it's actually handled by the procedure.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_CBT
member.summary: This hook type is used in CBT (computer base training) applications.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_SYSMSGFILTER
member.summary: Use this hook type to monitor messages passed to menus, message box, etc and the activation of different window by a keyboard shortcut.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_MOUSE
member.summary: Use this hook type to monitor mouse messages.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_DEBUG
member.summary: Hook procedure that is invoked before any other hook.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_FOREGROUNDIDLE
member.summary: Invoked when the foreground thread is to become idle.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_CALLWNDPROCRET
member.summary: Use this hook type to get the message passed to some of the windows procedures after it is handled by the procedure.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_KEYBOARD_LL
member.summary: Use this hook type to get keyboard events.

member.name: F:Telerik.WinControls.WindowsHook.HookType.WH_MOUSE_LL
member.summary: Use this hook type to get mouse events.

member.name: T:Telerik.WinControls.DllWrapper
member.summary: Wrapper of native dlls. This class automatically disposes the loaded dll.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.DllWrapper.#ctor
member.summary: The default wrapper has no dll and IsDllLoaded returns false.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.DllWrapper.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to load the given dll. If ti fails - IsDllLoaded will return false.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.DllWrapper.LoadDll(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a native dll by given name (could be name only or with full path). If only a name is given the Operatin System's search order will be used.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.DllWrapper.FreeDll
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged dll. This method is called both by Dispose and by the destructor so it is not obligatory to call it explicitly.
member.returns: true if the wrapped handle was truly released

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.DllWrapper.GetFunctionAsDelegate(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Gets a delegate that wraps a function in a native dll. This method works only if there is a successfully loaded dll.
member.param: Name of the function for which a delegate will be returned.
The type of the delegate that should be returned.
member.returns: Managed delegate of the given type or null on error.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.DllWrapper.IsDllLoaded
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether a native dll is loaded in this wrapper.

member.name: T:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix
member.summary: Represents a light-weight 3*3 Matrix to be used for GDI+ transformations.

member.summary: Initializes a new RadMatrix, using the specified parameters.

member.summary: Initializes a new RadMatrix, using the elements of the specified GDI+ Matrix instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.#ctor(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Initializes a new RadMatrix, applying the specified X and Y values as DX and DY members of the matrix.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Initializes a new RadMatrix, scaling it by the provided parameters, at the origin (0, 0).

member.summary: Initializes a new RadMatrix, scaling it by the provided parameters, at the specified origin.

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.#ctor(System.Single)
member.summary: Initializes a new RadMatrix, rotated by the specified angle (in degrees) at origin (0, 0).

member.name: M:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.#ctor(System.Single,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Initializes a new RadMatrix, rotated by the specified angle (in degrees) at the provided origin.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.IsEmpty
member.summary: Determines whether the current matrix is empty.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.IsIdentity
member.summary: Determines whether this matrix equals to the Identity one.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.Determinant
member.summary: Gets the determinant - [(M11 * M22) - (M12 * M21)] - of this Matrix.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.IsInvertible
member.summary: Determines whether this matrix may be inverted. That is to have non-zero determinant.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.ScaleX
member.summary: Gets the scale by the X axis, provided by this matrix.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.ScaleY
member.summary: Gets the scale by the Y axis, provided by this matrix.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.Rotation
member.summary: Gets the rotation (in degrees) applied to this matrix.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.Layouts.RadMatrix.Elements
member.summary: Gets all the six fields of the matrix as an array.

member.summary: Gets the only instance of the filter.

member.name: P:Telerik.WinControls.RadMessageFilter.Enabled
